name: DOD: Death Gratuity
description: Tax free payment of $100,000 to eligible survivors of members of the Armed Forces who died while on active duty or while serving in certain reserve statuses.
fullDescription: Tax free payment of $100,000 to eligible survivors of members of the Armed Forces who died while on active duty or while serving in certain reserve statuses.
whatTheyOffer: Provides support for qualified spouses, children, and other family members of deceased service members.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The deceased served in the active military
- The service status of the deceased is: active-duty service member or member of the National Guard/Reserves
- One of the following applies to the deceased: died while on active duty or Died while on inactive-duty service training
- The applicantâ€™s relationship to the deceased is: spouse, child, parent, or other family member
